text: I visited on 6 Jul 2024 Sat at around 4.45pm. Both the owner and his staff were welcoming and shared their knowledge about different artists with me as well as influences on their artworks. I have learnt quite bit in the conversations with them. All the best for their business and thank you! ^^

Name seal carving is a diminishing arts in Singapore.

Happen to met up this  young master name chee Keong thru Facebook . His carving skills is amazing, intriguing and unique. His customers service is amazing and a big hearted , friendly man whom is so passionate in sharing his knowledge about name seal stone carving , oil painting and arts works.

If you are on town , hit him up to chat with him .
